full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

* **Title**: Computer Application Support Services
* **Reference Number**: W6431-240113
* **Solicitation Number**: cb-669-18443522
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Publication Date**: July 6, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 21, 2023, 14:00 ET
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None
* **Tender Status**: Expired

**Key Details**
---------------

* **Classification**: Temporary personnel services (UNSPSC: 80111600)
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive selective tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest combined rating of technical merit and price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, and others (detailed below)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Ottawa, ON
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence
* **Contact Information**: Leanne Cooper, leanne.cooper@forces.gc.ca, (613) 392-2811

**Description**
-------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking professional services of a Senior Computer Application Support Specialist to provide modelling and simulation technology architecture support to the Exercise and Simulation branch of the Royal Canadian Air Force Aerospace Warfare Centre. The successful bidder will support the exploitation of the Defence Secure Simulation and Training Node infrastructure Information System.

The contractor will be required to provide technical expertise in the following areas:

* Modelling and simulation technology architecture support
* Computer application support services
* Technical writing and documentation
* Training and knowledge transfer

The successful bidder must demonstrate excellent technical and communication skills, with the ability to work independently and as part of a team. The contract will be awarded based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

Please note that all tender notices and supporting documents are available on the Canadabuys website [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). Only bids received by the tender closing date and time will be considered. No late bids will be accepted. Hope this is what you got for me.  Cheers.  FromJCV - [Jonathan Charles Villalon](https://github.com/JCV42/JCV42) ([@
